snippet: The overall turnout rate fell by nearly two percentage points from the 2008 to 2012 election, driven in part by a large drop in the youth vote. Black voters turned out at a higher rate than any other group in 2012, passing whites for the first time...
lead_paragraph: The overall turnout rate fell by nearly two percentage points from the 2008 to 2012 election, driven in part by a large drop in the youth vote. Black voters turned out at a higher rate than any other group in 2012, passing whites for the first time on record.
